biography: Lauri, a name synonymous with dedication and perseverance in the world of golf, hails from the esteemed Jyväs-Golf club. While his presence on the course is marked by a quiet intensity, those who know him speak of his jovial nature off the course.

With one past appearance at the Hector Trophée, Lauri has demonstrated a commitment to the sport. Although he hasn't secured a victory at the Hector Trophée or claimed the Victor Trophy, Lauri's approach to the game is characterized by continuous improvement and a relentless pursuit of excellence.

Currently considered retired from Hector events, Lauri will not be participating in the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025. However, the world of golf is ever-dynamic, and the possibility of a return remains open. Whether on the course or in spirit, Lauri's passion for golf continues to inspire.
